uniqueid="sk-1gF2-1195"><contents><p><u><strong>Running a Credit Search</strong></u></p>

<p>To run a credit search, please make sure all the required information is completed in the tables below. The Run Credit Seach button will appear once this is complete&nbsp;</p>

<p><u><strong>Sending a Credit Search</strong></u></p>

<p>To send a Credit Search, ensure the name of the recipient is in the box to the right.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Then click send on any credit reports you would like to send.&nbsp;</p>
